holidays.title: National DJ Day
holidays.description: From playing the 'Chicken Dance' for the millionth time to getting us through the morning commute, here's to DJs!

holidays.title: National Penguin Day
holidays.description: They walk around in tuxedos, they have a cute waddle, and they're unique!

holidays.title: Camcorder Day
holidays.description: Get ready to record as we celebrate the rich history of our beloved camcorder.

holidays.title: Guru Gobind Singh Jayanti
holidays.description: This year marks the 354th birth anniversary of Guru Gobind Singh.

holidays.title: International Day of Acceptance
holidays.description: Experience the tranquility as you journey through the divine paths of acceptance.

holidays.title: National Claudia Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to learn about variations, popularity, and facts about the name Claudia.

holidays.title: National Coffee Break Day
holidays.description: Take a break and let's enjoy a warm cup of great coffee together!

holidays.title: National Sebastian Day
holidays.description: Raise a glass to all the Sebastians around the world on National Sebastian Day.

holidays.title: Penguin Awareness Day
holidays.description: The penguin population needs us! Let’s get ready to raise awareness

holidays.title: Rid the World of Fad Diets & Gimmicks Day
holidays.description: Get ready for a healthy lifestyle — it’s Rid the World of Fad Diets and Gimmicks Day!

holidays.title: Take A Walk Outdoors Day
holidays.description: Put your sedentary life on pause and step out for a stroll today.

holidays.title: Bill Maher’s Birthday
holidays.description: For more than three decades, this iconic T.V. host has shown no signs of stopping.

holidays.title: Blueface’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing is holding back this talented rapper’s ascend to stardom and we celebrate him.

holidays.title: David Lynch’s Birthday
holidays.description: This renowned director is such a creative and talented staple of his generation.

holidays.title: Emma Marie’s Birthday
holidays.description: Emma Marie is a teenage YouTube sensation and social media personality with an exciting future.

holidays.title: Evan Peters’s Birthday
holidays.description: This gifted actor and film producer’s career can go nowhere but up.

holidays.title: Skeet Ulrich’s Birthday
holidays.description: The legendary actor has been around the block and has even branched out beyond acting.

holidays.title: Tyler Herro’s Birthday
holidays.description: When skill meets hard work, there is no stopping such a force as this one.
